commit_scope: Tighten pickup-and-execute endpoint security and harden remote-ops smoke coverage for protected execution behavior.

deploy_validation.notes: Push to main and ensure public deploy contract run after API redeploy.

e2e_validation.expected_behavior_delta: pickup-and-execute requires token when AGENT_EXECUTE_TOKEN is configured and rejects unauthenticated calls when token protection is enabled; remote-ops smoke now treats unauthenticated dispatch as the expected protected-state path.
test_flows: Run verify_remote_ops_smoke.sh with no token and confirm endpoint reports protected path on pickup-and-execute.
If execution token is configured, run pick-up execution through /api/agent/tasks/pickup-and-execute and verify a running/completed task transition.

phase_gate.reason: Pending production deployment and CI verification after security-hardening change.
